Description: Postcard; printed paper; monochrome (sepia) photograph showing a general view of the pyramids of Giza.
Curator's comments: Old card; postally used. Message reads: "My Dear Florrie, Here is a view of the Pyramids. You will understand from my letter. Post just about to leave. Kind regards to all. Yours most aff[ectionately] Jack".
Associated names: Named in inscription: Miss Florence Bradbury
